spiritsExplanation:
The workout primarily exhibits the "Flow & Rhythm" spirit, as indicated by the Pilates focus and the continuous full body movements emphasized in the title and tags, such as "pilates class" and "move with nicole." A score of 0.75 reflects high confidence, supported by this movement style and the music component mentioned in the description. 

"Structured & Disciplined" is also relevant, scoring 0.65. Finally, the "Soothing & Restorative" spirit receives a score of 0.5. Non-inclusion of other spirits is justified, as there are no signs of high-energy intensity, explicit sports techniques, or outdoor elements.
